bibl.title: Poseidippos, Epigr. 8 AB and Early Ptolemaic Cameos.
bibl.note: Modified version of a paper presented at the conference on Poseidippos that was organized by the Harvard Center for Hellenic Studies in April 2002. - P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309. In the opinion of the author, the eighth epigram of the Lithika describes a very large and elaborate cornelian cameo.
bibl.seg: KOSMETATOU Elizabeth, Poseidippos, Epigr. 8 AB and Early Ptolemaic Cameos.
